Regex Helper Line Filter All Tools

Generic Code Beautifier

Paste JSON/JSON5/HJSON, Python repr, PHP array/print_r/var_export, or even messy var_dump. We'll try to normalize & pretty-print. For unknown text, we fall back to a smart bracket-based formatter.

unknownstage: -
Notes & Limitations
  • Python converter handles dicts/lists/tuples, basic scalars. Sets & complex objects are not fully supported.
  • PHP support targets array(...), short arrays [...], and print_r/var_export styles. var_dump is best-effort.
  • Unknown structures fall back to bracket-based indentation that respects strings and escapes.
  • No evaluation of code is performed; everything is string-to-string transforms.
